entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
